articles.content: The 2022 Indian Premier League (IPL) has thrown umpteen possibilities for India's probable T20 World Cup squad over the course of the last two months. Besides the mainstay options, veteran cricketers… [+1978 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Umran can become an asset for India but...': Sehwag's big warning for KL Rahul - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virender Sehwag hailed Umran Malik as “special talent” and admitted that the youngster can emerge to be an “asset” for the Indian team but he also suggested KL Rahul to use the bowler effectively during the series against South Africa.
articles.content: Sunrisers Hyderabad pace sensation Umran Malik has been the cynosure of India's 18-member team for the impending five-match T20I series at home against South Africa. The youngster has been rewarded f… [+1777 chars]
